ing.item: Real bacon bits (I used Hormel brand in a jar)

directions.step:
Place ingredients in the bread maker according to the directions of the manufacturer. Start machine.
Personal notes: With my Panasonic, I put in the dry ingredients, then the wet, and I have a separate dispenser for the yeast. I selected sandwich mode, which would be light crust.
I found this recipe last week while "surfing." I mailed it to myself, but from what I have printed out, it came from recipes@soar.berkeley.edu. This goes into my notebook of "keepers."
Posted to EAT-L Digest 19 October 96
Date: Sun, 20 Oct 1996 18:06:26 EDT
From: "Sharon H. Frye" <shfrye@PEN.K12.VA.US>
